settings.banner-content: Free Shipping on all orders over $60
settings.text-section-main-desc: Lone Star Templates is dedicated to providing you professionally designed BigCommerce templates at an affordable price. With a Lone Star Template as your starting point you can capture your audience by showcasing your style and telling your story. You too can have a stunning store your customers will love to shop.
settings.hp_sidebyside_first_desc: Showcase your products and tell your story
settings.hp_sidebyside_sec_desc: Stay up to date with the latest designer collections
settings.hp_horizontal_1_desc: Beautifully styled banner sections on the homepage allow you to highlight specific products and categories
settings.hp_horizontal_2_desc: Robust theme customizer and page builder allow you to take full control of your design with zero coding
settings.hp_parallax_desc: Parallax scrolling is a great way to add depth to your website and create an unforgettable user experience for your customer
settings.newsletter_popup_description: Subscribe to our Newsletter for exclusive offers, company news and events.
settings.bottom-banner-content: Use this banner to promote special discounts and coupons. Save 25% on our orbit terrarium!

meta.description: Noble is a beautifully designed BigCommerce theme that is ready for any industry. With Noble as your starting point you can capture your audience by showcasing your style and telling your story. You too can have a stunning store your customers will love to shop. It's fully responsive and built to look and adapt flawlessly on any device. Its transparent header option will set your store apart from the competition. Take advantage of additional homepage banner options to link categories, sales and other promotions. All Lone Star Templates are fully supported via theme updates. New features and enhancements are added regularly. Sell more with Noble!
